title: Miami showed Verstappen exploiting F1 rules to max – again
summary: Max Verstappen preserved his lead at the start of the Miami GP by knowing the letter of the F1 law – probably costing Lando Norris the win

qa_pairs.question: What is one of the key strategies that drivers often use at the start of a Formula 1 race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Preserving their lead through optimal positioning and knowledge of race regulations.
wrong_options: Aggressively overtaking all competitors at the first corner.
Driving in a straight line to maintain speed.
Pitting early to lose track position.

qa_pairs.question: Which driver was notably impacted by Max Verstappen's strategy during the Miami GP?
What is a common term for a driver who effectively utilizes the rules of Formula 1 to their advantage?
